## #RStats
This is the most widely used hashtag by the R twitter community.

## #Tidytuesday
Every week there is a tidytuesday challenge posted. It's a dataset that everyone makes visualisations about and shares theier results (and often source code too!). This is a fun way to improve your own skills by learnign hwo other sdo things and practicing on interested data sets. 
![](images/search_hashtags_tidyTuesday.jpg)
